name: Vr Art Gallery
summary: ArkPuntoZero Gallery Art In this app you will be able to admire my collection of works. On the occasion of the 500th anniversary of Leonardo da Vinci's death, paintings such as the Mona Lisa, the Annunciation, The Lady with an Ermine, the Virgin of the Rocks and many others, have been carefully reconstructed in stereoscopic 3D.
